info.title: Profile API
info.description: Provides CRUD operations on the Profile resource.

get.description: Returns the profile and associated accounts

400.description: Returned when the request body is malformatted or does not match the expected request.

401.description: Returned when the request does not contains the user's credentials.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to access the resource.

404.description: Returned when the resource is not found.

500.description: Returned when an unexpected error occured on the server side.

get.description: Returns an array of ProfileCard associated with the account for the profile based on profile identifier

400.description: Returned when the request body is malformatted or does not match the expected request.

account_id.description: AccountID is the unique identifier of an account.

branch.description: Branch is the branch code for the branch associated with the account.

branch_name.description: BranchName is the long-form name of the branch associated with the account.

status.description: Status is the status of the account.

accrued_interest_at_maturity_date.title: Interest accrues at an annual rate of interest that is fixed

amount_due.title: Specify when payments are due on money borrowed

available_balance.description: AvailableBalance is the available balance of the account.

available_credit_limit.description: AvailableCreditLimit is the available credit limit for the account.

checking_interest_rate.description: CheckingInterestRate is the interest rate of the account if it is a checking account.

contract_date.description: ContractDate is the date of the contract initialization.

credit_limit.description: CreditLimit is the allowed credit limit.

current_balance.description: CurrentBalance is the current balance of the account.

current_term.description: CurrentTerm is the account validity period.

due_date.description: DueDate is the loan maturity date.

interest_rate.description: InterestRate is the interest rate for the account.

maturity_date.title: MaturityDate is the maturity date, format is ISO 8601

next_payment_due_date.title: Specify when payments are due on money borrowed

owner_name.description: OwnerName is the name of the account's owner.

accountsAccount.description: Account holds all details about a bank account.

profileGetProfileCardsResponse.description: GetProfileCardsResponse is the response message for retrieving customer cards.

profileGetProfileResponse.description: GetProfileResponse is the response message for retrieving customer profile.

last_four.description: LastFour is the last four digits of the card.

owner_name.description: OwnerName is the name of the card's owner.

type.description: Type is the type of the account associated with the card.

profileProfileCard.description: ProfileCard holds details about a customer's credit card.

country_name.description: CountryName holds the country name information.

city_name.description: CityName holds the city name information.

postal_code.description: PostalCode holds the postal code information.

typesAddress.title: Address hold all details about Address

cur.description: Cur is the currency of the amount.

num.description: Num is the value of the amount.

typesMajorCategory.description:
MajorCategory describes the category of the account.

 - Dep: MajorCategory_Dep for deposit category.
 - Loan: MajorCategory_Loan for loan category.

typesMajorType.description:
MajorType describes the type of the account.

 - Checking: MajorType_Checking account.
 - Saving: MajorType_Saving account.
 - TimeDeposit: MajorType_TimeDeposit for a time deposit account.
 - CommercialLoan: MajorType_CommercialLoan for a business loan account.
 - MortgageLoan: MajorType_MortgageLoan for a home loan account.
 - ConsumerLoan: MajorType_ConsumerLoan for a consumer loan account.

profile_id.description: ProfileID is the unique identifier of a profile.

country.description: User country code (VN, US, ID, SG, ...).

email_verified.title: True if email is verified, otherwise False

face_image_date.title: Date when the face image was added/updated

highest_education_attained.title: Highest education such as bachelor, masters etc

middle_name.title: MiddleName or middle names (space separated) of the person

last_name.title: LastName or last names (space separated) of the person

OAuth2.description: Access to profile resources is restricted to authenticated users. The authentication process follows the Authorization Code flow.
